import React from 'react'; import OrderTable from '../ordertable/ordertable.component'; // import NewOrderItem from '../new-order-item/new-order-item.component'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import './orderpage.styles.scss'; class OrderPage extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ active: [], unconfirmed: [], complete: [] } } componentDidMount(){ console.log(localStorage.email) fetch('/users/neworders') .then(res=> res.json()) .then(unconfirmed => this.setState({unconfirmed})) fetch('/users/pendingorders') .then(res=> res.json()) .then(active => this.setState({active})) fetch('/users/completedorders') .then(res=> res.json()) .then(complete => this.setState({complete})) } render() { return (
Pending Confirmation {this.state.unconfirmed.length}
{this.state.unconfirmed.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
Active Orders {this.state.active.length}
{this.state.active.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
Completed Orders {this.state.complete.length}
{this.state.complete.map(({ id, ...otherSectionProps }) => ( ))}
Order number Items Total Price Order Type Address Status
); } } export default OrderPage;
